tr.td: URI specifying the specific mappings from model types to language types. (i.e. file:${basedir}/JavaMappings.xml)
URI specifying the mappings file to use for mapping from model types to SQL types for generated EJB entities. (i.e. file:${basedir}/Oracle9iMappings.xml).
URI specifying the mappings file to use for mapping from model types to JDBC types in the generated Entity EJBs. (i.e. file:${basedir}/JdbcMappings.xml).

The maximum length that a SQL name (such as a column name or table name) may be. This is useful for databases that have a limit on the lengh that a name used in DDL may be (like Oracle). If you set this to 30 for example, then all names will be truncated after 30 characters when retrieveing the column name or table name.
The directory to which Entity EJBs are generated.

The location to which Entity EJB implementation files are generated.
Yes (unless ignore is specified for this property)
The directory to which Session Bean files are generated.
Yes (unless ignore is specified for this property)
The directory to which Session Bean implementation files are generated.
Yes (unless ignore is specified for this property)
Specifies whether or not default identifiers should be created for entities that do not have them modeled.
The name to give default identifiers.
The type to give default identifiers.
The visibility to give default identifiers.
The prefix to give to the EJB JNDI names (this allows the same EJBs to be deployed multiple times in the same container)
